<title level="1" right="Rules">[Sustaining Activations](/Rules.aspx?ID=3145)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 220 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some items, once activated, have effects that can be sustained if you concentrate on them. Sustaining an effect requires using the [Sustain](/Actions.aspx?ID=2317) action. If an item’s description states that you can sustain the effect, that effect lasts until the end of your turn in the round after you Activated the Item. You can use a Sustain action on that turn to extend the duration.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
